thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: Regina
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Regina

author: Regina
title: Regina
text: We have been dealing with Pets best for many years. We have never had a problem at all. They are fair and quick to make a payment if you deserve one. The few times that I've had to speak to them they have been friendly and courteous and answer my question so I understood them. The second best thing I did after getting my dog was to get her insurance from them. Frank Alongi
